caller_intent: Jason Newman wants to review his bundled auto, home, and personal umbrella insurance policies with Auto Owners, particularly after a tax assessment increase in Davy County affected his homeowners insurance costs. He seeks alternatives to ensure he's getting the best deal.
resolution_steps: Agent confirmed Jason's current policies (auto, home, umbrella) with Auto Owners and noted the mid-policy period (renews in August).
Explained penalties for changing policies mid-term (higher daily rates on auto insurance).
Proposed waiting until July to renew and shop for better rates collectively.
Offered to adjust homeowners deductible for potential savings.
Agreed to set a July reminder and reassess options.
knowledge_required: Insurance policy renewal terms and mid-term penalty rules
Impact of tax assessments on homeowners insurance rates
Strategies for bundling insurance policies to retain discounts
summary: Jason Newman discussed his bundled insurance policies with his agent, seeking alternatives after a tax assessment increase raised his homeowners insurance costs. The agent explained mid-term change penalties and proposed reassessing in July when the policy renews. Jason agreed to wait and explore options then, with the agent offering to adjust deductibles for potential savings.
